name: Smartwatch
description: The most elegant expression of Apple Watch returns with two iconic materials — titanium and ceramic. Featuring all the innovations and the craftsmanship of traditional watchmaking. It’s as modern as can be and as classic as it gets.

reviews.name: Thomas
reviews.description: Im always missing calls and messages so having this is a game changer, it is great quality and is not slow seeing there is newer watches out battery life is also fantastic

reviews.name: Dane
reviews.description: Came to the Apple Watch party quite late. Was actually looking at FitBit for the gym when the lady at the shop suggested the Apple Watch. So happy I chose the Apple Watch, does everything I wanted it for and then some. Would definitely recommend!
